interface.encoding_desc: Encoding used for all downloaded files.
interface.score_desc: Minimum verdict required before a service result section gets auto-expanded.
interface.view_desc: Default view shown when opening completed submissions.
save.success: The settings have been successfully saved in the system.
save.text: Are you sure you want to save the settings in the system?
save.title: Save Settings
services.description: Select the services that will be enabled by default and define their corresponding parameters for the submission.
submissions.classification_desc: Default classification used for new submissions.
submissions.deep_scan_desc: Perform deeper analysis of the file by turning on more checks. Slower and not recommended for bulk analysis.
submissions.default_external_sources_des: List of source that will be used by default when starting a submission with a certain hash or URL
submissions.description: Set the default values of the submission options for this profile.
submissions.recursion_prevention_desc: Ensures that children of analysis services are not sent back to certain services for analysis.
submissions.executive_summary_desc: Show executive summaries generated by AI while viewing file/submission details pages.
submissions.filtering_desc: Allow filtering services to skip files if they believe the files are safe.
submissions.generate_alert_desc: Submission will trigger an alert on completion of analysis.
submissions.profile_desc: Add extra debugging steps to your scans so they can be traced better in the logs.
submissions.result_caching_desc: Cache service results so files don't have to be re-scanned if the service did not change.
submissions.submission_profile_desc: Default submission profile that is selected for new submissions.
submissions.ttl_desc: Number of days your submissions will stay in the system.
title: Settings
